sn47.46:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn47.46:2.1: “Sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn47.46:2.2: “Tasmatiha tvam, bhikkhu, adimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
sn47.46:2.4: Idha tvam, bhikkhu, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharahi acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhassu sikkhapadesu.
sn47.46:2.5: Yato kho tvam, bhikkhu, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharissasi acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi samadaya sikkhassu sikkhapadesu; tato tvam, bhikkhu, silam nissaya sile patitthaya cattaro satipatthane bhaveyyasi.
sn47.46:3.2: Idha tvam, bhikkhu, kaye kayanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.46:3.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharahi atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.46:3.6: Yato kho tvam, bhikkhu, silam nissaya sile patitthaya ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhavessasi, tato tuyham, bhikkhu, ya ratti va divaso va agamissati vuddhiyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu, no parihani”ti.
sn47.46:3.7: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn47.46:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
sn47.46:4.2: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn47.46:4.3: Annataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahatam ahositi.
